Name: Issue 332
Introduction: G'day everyone, welcome to issue #332 of Weekly Xamarin - a weekly overview of what happened this past week in the Xamarin and MAUI communities. Sorry for the late publish this week, but rest assured there is a bunch of great articles and videos to dig into this week. Enjoy and stay safe, ❤ Kym

Articles.Title: Local Deploy to Multiple Emulators
Articles.Description: If you are looking for an easy way to test Xamarin.Forms or MAUI Application in a couple of Android Emulators and iOS Simulators at the same time, here is an interesting approach.
Articles.Author: Bohdan Benetskyi

Articles.Title: Use the iOS system colors in Xamarin.Forms
Articles.Description: Apple has defined some best practices for coloring our iOS apps. To make it easier, Apple created system colors that are (partly) adaptive to the system's coloring. In this post, Marco shows you how to use these colors in Xamarin.Forms.
Articles.Author: Marco Siccardi

Articles.Title: Assets and HTML pages as "embedded resource"
Articles.Description: Maybe you want to pull a HTML page from an embedded resource inside your Xamarin.Forms project - well now you know how.
Articles.Author: Felipe Baltazar

Articles.Title: Create DataMatrix Barcodes With Telerik UI for Xamarin
Articles.Description: Telerik UI for Xamarin R3 2021 brings DataMatrix symbology to the Barcode control, so you can easily generate data matrix codes.
Articles.Author: Yana Kerpecheva

Articles.Title: Create a File Picker Using Xamarin.Essentials and Telerik UI
Articles.Description: Pick files with Xamarin.Essentials FilePicker API and visualize them in your mobile and desktop apps using the Telerik UI for Xamarin suite.
Articles.Author: Dobrinka Yordanova

Articles.Title: First Steps on MAUI Beach
Articles.Description: Dave get started with a fantastic series on getting started with MAUI.
Articles.Author: Dave Murray

Articles.Title: Applying borders in .NET MAUI
Articles.Description: MAUI has border properties which you can use out of the box. (RIP PancakeView). In this post Leomaris introduces you to them.
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: Create Your First .NET MAUI App with Microsoft MVP Codrina Merigo
Articles.Description: This blog provides show notes for our November 11, 2021 webinar, “Create Your First .NET MAUI App.” The webinar was presented by Microsoft MVP Codrina Merigo.
Articles.Author: Graham High

Articles.Title: Sands of MAUI: Issue #36
Articles.Description: Sam updates us on the weeks MAUI happenings
Articles.Author: Sam Basu

Articles.Title: .NET MAUI Roadmap Previews
Articles.Description: If you want to know where to find out where MAUI is up to, Leomaris shares it here.
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: Android for .NET 6: The .NET Show with Carl Franklin Ep 14
Articles.Description: Carl welcomes Microsoft’s Jonathan Peppers to talk about how Android projects work in .NET 6.
Articles.Author: Carl Franklin

Articles.Title: Develop iOS Apps Without a Mac, on Windows with Xamarin Hot Restart
Articles.Description: That's right, with Xamarin Hot Restart you can develop iOS apps straight from Windows, without ever having to own a Mac. In this video I will go over what Xamarin Hot Restart is exactly and how to get you started with development in Visual Studio 2022. Last but not least: I tell you the secret on how to even publish your app to the App Store... FOR FREE!
Articles.Author: Gerald Versluis

Articles.Title: Merge Conflict: 284: C# 10 Global & Implicit Usings
Articles.Description: Are global and implicit usings controversial? It seem so, we discuss all the details of this awesome C# 10 feature.
Articles.Author: Merge Conflict

Articles.Title: Null Pointers 76: Coded UI & Comet
Articles.Description: Coded UI in Xamarin.Forms is not as popular as using XAML, but if you ask our guest Brandon Minnick we’re all crazy for liking XAML so much. Join us in learning why!
Articles.Author: Null Pointers
